Division will never take different political parties to win this election.!!! Please get together and selected a single candidate without fighting for a single post.!!!! by some money, few sheets of Asbestoes, some bags of cement, because they are unable to understand the gravity of the situation.!!!
Your party need to appoint Mr. Nagananda as the President, Prof. Ajith Kolonne or you to be the Prime-minister or Foreign Minister, and all intellectual in your party people given due positions to win this election and develop the country.!!! Otherwise you will be playing into the hands of your party's rivals.!!! 
Unity and tolerance is the most important factor, if your party ever want to win and save this country.!!!

comments.comment:
In NAGANANDA'S Election Manifesto he is asking for a DEMOCRATIC MANDATE from the people of the country to enact the Proposed New Constitution. As it's mentioned In his manifesto, not only is NAGANANDA asking the people to elect him as the President of SRI LANKA, but also NAGANANDA is requesting permission to repeal and replace the current flawed constitution, THROUGH THE MEDIUM OF THE PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION. In other words, a referendum for a SYSTEM CHANGE, OR A CONSTITUTIONAL REVOLUTION. IF AND WHEN people VOTE for NAGANANDA with a MAJORITY, immediately afterwards, the old constitution would automatically become invalid,void, invalidated, rescinded, worthless or powerless and be abolished/repealed and The NEW CONSTITUTION WOULD BECOME THE SUPREME LAW OF THE LAND. The myth that you need a 2/3 majority to change the old constitution is busted, due to the fundamental reason that people have already rejected it by a DEMOCRATIC MANDATE and it would carry no power. So, that would be the WILL OF THE PEOPLE and there would be no going back.


It's called, Representative Democracy, in PRINCIPLE, the people are recognized as the "SUPREME AUTHORITY" or, The Political POWER EXERCISED BY THE PEOPLE of the country. It can be done not just by NAGANANDA, but any representative of the people, any candidate of a political party, independent candidate etc; for that matter. 100% DEMOCRATIC, CONTRACTUALLY OBLIGATED, LEGALLY BINDING AND MOST OF ALL, DOABLE.
please also read: https://www.google.com/search?q=doctrine+of+necessity&oq=doctorine+of+ne&aqs=chrome.1.69i57j0l3.29530j1j9&client=ms-android-zte&sourceid=chrome-mobile&ie=UTF-8
comments.author: NiFtY

comments.comment: MCC+ACSA+SOFA+GOTABHAYA RAJAPAKSHA = 200KM LONG ECONOMIC BELT CONNECTING TRINCO AND COLOMBO + LOSS OF 1.2 MILLION ACRES INCLUDING LAND OF HISTORIC VALUE+SERIOUS THREAT TO SOVEREIGNTY AND THE TERRITORIAL INTEGRITY OF SRI LANKA!! the final outcome?......."A SLAVE NATION",  A "VASSAL STATE " OF AMERICA!!!

comments.comment: Mr Gamini , Mr Ajith and Mr Nagananda, if you can't make only one alternative against the present political situation,  you guys will be the most  useless and dangerous to this society as educated people. Also it indicate that, you know only Auditing, Personnel Management  and Law, nothing else about the human society. After the election ,Public will  understand ,what were you doing. Also if you can not gettogether as one and only one alternative, that means you are  manupulated by someone against NPP. And your aim is to become MPS' from the National list of  some other political party. OK Sirs.
comments.author: Wijesingha Peduruarachchige

comments.comment: We feel that you let us down by leaving the coalition with Mr Nagananda Kodituwakku. Now by what you are doing again we will be forced  to live with same people,same system on the way to total ruination.  Stop bickering among yourselves back the man with the only way out of this predicament we are facing.  Gentlemen please join with Mr Nagananda Kodituwakku.

replies.replyComment: Ane me danna deyak kiyanawa halo.....unta car prmit  wala unak na....anika aka hora kamak neme ne....oya serama un.wikunala thiyenne....uba giyath ,mama giyath oka karanawa....dan naga nanda giyoth nikan idi....
@Sumithra Gamage JVP MPsla car permit vikkata passe , e aya gana kumata katha ?
Jvp aya pryogikawa oppu kara hamaraya....a aya mudalata yata nowana bawa....pudgalikawa.  A aya labapu warap prasada kisiwak natha 1994 sita.a aya prlimenthuwe siti......

Oba ta  sithenne...prlimenthu kriyakara kam.desa bala la neda.....madak sithanna....2005 di mahinda janadi pathi karanda jvp aka   monatharm udaw kalada....2001. Ranil kotith aka hora giwisum gahapu we le..pariwasa andu hadamin..chandri ka samaga...ratata hodak kale nadda,,chandruka sunami sahana gena kota ...ayata wiruddawa aliyata awe nadda...mahaththayo...jvp aka thirana ganne nayakaya  kiyana thani.matha yata neme...samuhika.  Thirana....anika oba oya kiyana widihata.....unp akata kade yanawa nam....a ayata maru natharam warap prasada ganda pu√±uwanda
....ranila  samaga akata yanne.rajapaksa la misaka wena kawuda...mona tharam nadu thogayak...raja paksa paulata.thiyanawada...jvp.karayekuta thibuna nam,...melahata hire...yawala.....aka sarayak balaya.di balamu...athakota therei...hoda ho naraka....awurudu 71 ma. Unp slp walata dunna ne...

Na a aya hoda awanka ratata janathawata adaraya karana danum samudayak athi  wagakimak darimata sudusu....sanwedi minissu....namuth...bedila wenwela illuwoth katada wasi....sajithata ho gotata...yatharthaya aththa akai....neda.  ..kalpana karanda. .ajith kolonne,nagananda wage aya hoda unata....ahema dinanda.ba..jvp akatath dinanda ba....akathu wela balawe gayak.hadiya uthui....bahuthara janathwa harak...aththa akai...
Jvp hara an kisiwak wiswasa karanda apa.....mokada jvp yanu anura kumara ho.tilvin nowe.  A aya ahi nayakayo.pamani...
